Source string: He runs a butcher shop. He wants to make food out of them.
Translation: He runs a butcher shop. He wants to make food out of them.

Source string: That's right. Morry's old man was a butcher! It looks like your childhood memories of the circus got all mixed up with his childhood memories of his dad's butcher shop.
Translation: That's right. Morry's old man was a butcher! It looks like your childhood memories of the circus got all mixed up with his childhood memories of his dad's butcher shop.

Source string: My memories were bad enough. This is just gross.
Translation: My memories were bad enough. This is just gross.

Source string: You'd better keep that kid out of trouble.
Translation: You'd better keep that kid out of trouble.

Source string: With your brains all scrambled like this, what happens to him, happens to you!
Translation: With your brains all scrambled like this, what happens to him, happens to you!

Source string: Don't run or else Daddy's gonna kill you.
Translation: Don't run or else Daddy's gonna kill you.

Source string: It's okay, those monsters are gone now.
Translation: It's okay, those monsters are gone now.

Source string: He says little bunnies are good for nothing.
Translation: He says little bunnies are good for nothing.

Source string: DON'T RUN OR ELSE DADDY'S GONNA KILL YA!!!
Translation: DON'T RUN OR ELSE DADDY'S GONNA KILL YA!!!

Source string: Don't run or else Daddy's gonna kill ya!
Translation: Don't run or else Daddy's gonna kill ya!

Source string: What's going on here? What have you done to our circus?
Translation: What's going on here? What have you done to our circus?

Source string: Polluted! Perverted! This looks like the work of MENTALISTS!
Translation: Polluted! Perverted! This looks like the work of MENTALISTS!

Source string: Have you been associating with PSYCHICS?
Translation: Have you been associating with PSYCHICS?

Source string: Psychics! Fortune tellers! They killed your grandfather! They cursed our entire family to die in water!
Translation: Psychics! Fortune tellers! They killed your grandfather! They cursed our entire family to die in water!

Source string: Including you, Razputin, and me. But I'm going to live, you know why? Because I'm still an acrobat.
Translation: Including you, Razputin, and me. But I'm going to live, you know why? Because I'm still an acrobat.

Source string: What's it going to be, son? Die in the water? Or show me what you got?
Translation: What's it going to be, son? Die in the water? Or show me what you got?

Source string: Let's see if you remember your training!
Translation: Let's see if you remember your training!

Source string: Quick! Up here! Before the cold clammy hand of fear pulls you under!
Translation: Quick! Up here! Before the cold clammy hand of fear pulls you under!

Source string: Maybe if you spent more time practicing your acrobatics and less time reading those comic books you'd be up here by now!
Translation: Maybe if you spent more time practicing your acrobatics and less time reading those comic books you'd be up here by now!

Source string: Mmm. Pretty good. BUT NOT GOOD ENOUGH.
Translation: Mmm. Pretty good. BUT NOT GOOD ENOUGH.

Source string: You used to LIKE to play catch with me!
Translation: You used to LIKE to play catch with me!

Source string: Well, just as well. One fewer psychic in the world!
Translation: Well, just as well. One fewer psychic in the world!

Source string: No, I used the acrobatics you taught me!
Translation: No, I used the acrobatics you taught me!

Source string: Make that GROUND. Ha ha ha.
Translation: Make that GROUND. Ha ha ha.

Source string: What is your brain doing out here in this tank with this other brain?
Translation: What is your brain doing out here in this tank with this other brain?

Source string: And who are all these unconscious people?
Translation: And who are all these unconscious people?

Source string: What have you gotten yourself involved with?
Translation: What have you gotten yourself involved with?

Source string: Is that really how I look in your mind?
Translation: Is that really how I look in your mind?

Source string: I don't hate psychics! I used my psychic connection with you to find you, and to project myself into your mind.
Translation: I don't hate psychics! I used my psychic connection with you to find you, and to project myself into your mind.

Source string: Son, I could never hate you. I only wanted you to be happy, Razputin. And safe.
Translation: Son, I could never hate you. I only wanted you to be happy, Razputin. And safe.

Source string: I have a LOT more hair than that!
Translation: I have a LOT more hair than that!

Source string: Now, son, we have to carefully unweave your psyche from that other brain.
Translation: Now, son, we have to carefully unweave your psyche from that other brain.

Source string: We don't want anything bad to happen while your mind is in this tangled state. The damage could be permanent.
Translation: We don't want anything bad to happen while your mind is in this tangled state. The damage could be permanent.

Source string: And I think I can juggle now!
Translation: And I think I can juggle now!

Source string: This is your mind, so YOU are the strong one here.
Translation: This is your mind, so YOU are the strong one here.

Source string: What I'm about to give you, my son--you must take care of it. Because it's everything I've got.
Translation: What I'm about to give you, my son--you must take care of it. Because it's everything I've got.

Source string: Oh, I know a lot of it. While you were out I... poked around a bit.
Translation: Oh, I know a lot of it. While you were out I... poked around a bit.

Source string: I'm not going to hurt you!
Translation: I'm not going to hurt you!

Source string: You gotta help me protect the bunnies!
Translation: You gotta help me protect the bunnies!

Source string: The bunnies are safe. We're all safe!
Translation: The bunnies are safe. We're all safe!

Source string: Stupid, spikey, flaming, juggling pins! Who invented those?
Translation: Stupid, spikey, flaming, juggling pins! Who invented those?

Source string: Ahhh! Puncture wound. Flaming puncture wound. Grr.
Translation: Ahhh! Puncture wound. Flaming puncture wound. Grr.

Source string: You always were the slow one!
Translation: You always were the slow one!

Source string: Hm. Come on, we're not done yet.
Translation: Hm. Come on, we're not done yet.

Source string: Don't stop now. The water's still rising!
Translation: Don't stop now. The water's still rising!

Source string: No, you can't really catch those. I was just testing ya.
Translation: No, you can't really catch those. I was just testing ya.

Source string: Don't lie to me, cheater! You crystal ball readers always cheat!
Translation: Don't lie to me, cheater! You crystal ball readers always cheat!

Source string: Oly! Are you okay? Where's your dad?
Translation: Oly! Are you okay? Where's your dad?

Source string: He's over there. Talking to your dad.
Translation: He's over there. Talking to your dad.

Source string: Razputin! I see your skull is as hard to penetrate as ever!
Translation: Razputin! I see your skull is as hard to penetrate as ever!

Source string: Psychics! He's been cavorting with filthy, cheating psychics!
Translation: Psychics! He's been cavorting with filthy, cheating psychics!

Source string: Man, do I hate psychics, and seeing my son happy!
Translation: Man, do I hate psychics, and seeing my son happy!

Source string: But how can you hate me for being psychic, if you're psychic too?
Translation: But how can you hate me for being psychic, if you're psychic too?

Source string: I like it this way. I mean, look at how huge I am!
Translation: I like it this way. I mean, look at how huge I am!

Source string: Ah! Ah! Bunnies! No! No meat! Ah!
Translation: Ah! Ah! Bunnies! No! No meat! Ah!

Source string: Shhh. No more. No more meat. Look.
Translation: Shhh. No more. No more meat. Look.

Source string: There you go. Goooood little bunny. Ha ha!
Translation: There you go. Goooood little bunny. Ha ha!

Source string: Hey, thanks for helping me save the bunnies. And for talking to my dad.
Translation: Hey, thanks for helping me save the bunnies. And for talking to my dad.

Source string: Bye! Bye! Wave goodbye, Mr. Bun!
Translation: Bye! Bye! Wave goodbye, Mr. Bun!

Source string: We're separating the brains now Razputin.
Translation: We're separating the brains now Razputin.

Source string: Man, I can't wait to tell you about all the messed up stuff that happened.
Translation: Man, I can't wait to tell you about all the messed up stuff that happened.

Source string: Tell me about this Lili person.
Translation: Tell me about this Lili person.

Source string: No, not me! Grab the bunny! I'm not a bunny! I'm not!
Translation: No, not me! Grab the bunny! I'm not a bunny! I'm not!

Source string: Oh, I got you, Mr. Bunny!
Translation: Oh, I got you, Mr. Bunny!

Source string: Now, let's get you to safety!
Translation: Now, let's get you to safety!

Source string: You gotta help me save the bunny!
Translation: You gotta help me save the bunny!

Source string: If he'd just hold still I could catch him and hide him from my dad.
Translation: If he'd just hold still I could catch him and hide him from my dad.

Source string: Oh, hi. My name is Morceau Oleander. But you can call me Morry. Or Oly.
Translation: Oh, hi. My name is Morceau Oleander. But you can call me Morry. Or Oly.

Source string: What are you doing in my mind?
Translation: What are you doing in my mind?

Source string: How did you get in my happy meadow? Nobody's supposed to know about it.
Translation: How did you get in my happy meadow? Nobody's supposed to know about it.

Source string: You didn't tell my dad about it, did you?
Translation: You didn't tell my dad about it, did you?

Source string: That's him! Oh no! Come on, little bunny. We'll be safe in here!
Translation: That's him! Oh no! Come on, little bunny. We'll be safe in here!

Source string: Okay, the circus I remember from my childhood was definitely not made of meat--the last time I checked.
Translation: Okay, the circus I remember from my childhood was definitely not made of meat--the last time I checked.

Source string: No! No! Little bunny don't go in there!
Translation: No! No! Little bunny don't go in there!

Source string: That's a bad place! That's a bad place for bunnies!
Translation: That's a bad place! That's a bad place for bunnies!

Source string: We did it! We saved all the bunnies!
Translation: We did it! We saved all the bunnies!

Source string: Now it's time for the main event!
Translation: Now it's time for the main event!

Source string: Come on! This is my favorite ride!
Translation: Come on! This is my favorite ride!

Source string: (clicking noise, calling bunny)...that's it...(more clicking)...come here!
Translation: (clicking noise, calling bunny)...that's it...(more clicking)...come here!

Source string: One cobweb turned in for a card.
Translation: One cobweb turned in for a card.

Source string: Bonus rank up for finding 8 Scavenger Hunt items!
Translation: Bonus rank up for finding 8 Scavenger Hunt items!

Source string: Bonus rank up for finding all 16 Scavenger Hunt items!
Translation: Bonus rank up for finding all 16 Scavenger Hunt items!

Source string: You have no PSI CARDS, SCAVENGER HUNT ITEMS, MENTAL COBWEBS, or reclaimed BRAINS to redeem!
Translation: You have no PSI CARDS, SCAVENGER HUNT ITEMS, MENTAL COBWEBS, or reclaimed BRAINS to redeem!

Source string: Razputin, your journey has made you much wiser, so why do you still hoard your goods like a miser?  The items you've scavenged, the webs, the cards, and brains--just to redeem them is all that remains!
Translation: Razputin, your journey has made you much wiser, so why do you still hoard your goods like a miser?  The items you've scavenged, the webs, the cards, and brains--just to redeem them is all that remains!

Source string: Next time his cleaver gets stuck in the ground, run up his arm and punch him in his fat head.
Translation: Next time his cleaver gets stuck in the ground, run up his arm and punch him in his fat head.

Source string: One cobweb turned in for a card
Translation: One cobweb turned in for a card
